description:
Rumer Willis has been tapped for a recurring role on the current third season of Fox’s hit hip-hop drama series Empire, co-created by Lee Daniels and Danny Strong. Rumer Willis已经确定要作为常驻演员出演由Lee Daniels和Danny Strong创作的 Fox的Hip-hop美剧《嘻哈帝国》第三季。

Willis will play Tory Ash, a brilliant but volatile singer/songwriter whose talent becomes invaluable to Jamal (Jussie Smollett) as he creates his most important musical work yet. Her own attempt to make a crossover comeback and her unwillingness to shy away from controversy will have ripple effects throughout Empire. Willis将饰演一位十分有才但不太稳定的创作型歌手Tory Ash，但她的潜力对Jamal (Jussie Smollett)来讲无可估量，创作了他到目前为止最好的音乐作品。她自己将尝试音乐之间的交叉，并且不回避那些争论，这点将扩大她对《嘻哈帝国》整部剧的影响。

Other notable guest stars/recurring players on the current Season 3 of Empire include Mariah Carey, Taye Diggs, Birdman and French Montana.本剧第三季其他值得注意的常驻演员和客串演员还有牛姐，泰雅迪格斯，鸟人还有French Montana。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 演员兼歌手露茉、天后牛姐等大批大佬加盟《嘻哈帝国》第三季
